questions.question: What is the traveling salesman problem?

answers.a: A problem in which a salesman must visit a set of cities and return to the starting city
answers.b: A problem in which a salesman must visit a set of cities in any order
answers.c: A problem in which a salesman must visit a set of cities and stay in the last city

questions.question: What is the objective of the traveling salesman problem?

answers.a: To minimize the total distance traveled by the salesman
answers.b: To maximize the total distance traveled by the salesman
answers.c: To find the shortest route between two cities

questions.question: What is the complexity of the traveling salesman problem?
Which of the following algorithms is a heuristic for the traveling salesman problem?

answers.a: A method to select two cities and swap their positions in the route
answers.b: A way to generate all possible routes and select the shortest one
answers.c: A heuristic approach to group cities into clusters
